name: pug-sass-starter-repo
description: Repo containing files to bootstrap a Pug.js and Sass project, including build scripts, Pug.js starter templates, and Sass base styles (based on Bulma.io styles)

scripts.build: npm run html && npm run assets && npm run css
scripts.production: npm run html && npm run assets && npm run css -- --style=compressed --no-source-map

author: Josh RosenHanst
